FuncDef: This command defines the dns address(es) to be assigned to the far-end of the associated PPP/MLPPP link via IPCP extensions.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a unicast IPv4 address for the primary DNS server to be signaled to the far-end of the associate PPP/MLPPP link via IPCP extensions.
Specifies a unicast IPv4 address for the secondary DNS server to be signaled to the far-end of the associate PPP/MLPPP link via IPCP extensions.
